abstract: China has made its first supercomputer based on Chinese microprocessor chips, advance that surprised high-performance computing specialists in the United States; Sunway system, which can perform about 1,000 trillion calculations per second, will probably rank among the 20 fastest computers in the world.
snippet: The Sunway system, which can perform about 1,000 trillion calculations per second — a petaflop — will probably rank among the 20 fastest computers in the world.
lead_paragraph: The Sunway system, which can perform about 1,000 trillion calculations per second — a petaflop — will probably rank among the 20 fastest computers in the world.

headline.print_headline: China Has Homemade Supercomputer Gain, With Own Chips
headline.seo: China Unveils Supercomputer Based on Its Own Chips
